com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql.models

Class DatabaseEditions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql.models.DatabaseEditions

  • public abstract class DatabaseEditions
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the valid editions of Azure SQL Databases.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BASIC
      The Basic Edition Database is best suited for small databases with few transactions (<100) per minute and only a couple users.
      static java.lang.String BUSINESS
      The Business Edition Database is best suited for independent software vendors (ISVs), line-of-business (LOB) applications, and enterprise applications.
      static java.lang.String PREMIUM
      The Premium Edition Database is for situations requiring a high number of transactionsper second (>100).
      static java.lang.String STANDARD
      The Standard Edition Database is best suited for a group of users makingfewer than 1000 transactions per minute.
      static java.lang.String WEB
      The Web Edition Database is best suited for small Web applications and workgroup or departmental applications.

    • Field Detail

      • WEB

        public static final java.lang.String WEB
        The Web Edition Database is best suited for small Web applications and workgroup or departmental applications. This edition supports a database with a maximum size of 1 or 5 GB of data.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BUSINESS

        public static final java.lang.String BUSINESS
        The Business Edition Database is best suited for independent software vendors (ISVs), line-of-business (LOB) applications, and enterprise applications. This edition supports a database of up to 150 GB of data, in 10GB increments up to 50GB, and then 50 GB increments.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BASIC

        public static final java.lang.String BASIC
        The Basic Edition Database is best suited for small databases with few transactions (<100) per minute and only a couple users.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STANDARD

        public static final java.lang.String STANDARD
        The Standard Edition Database is best suited for a group of users makingfewer than 1000 transactions per minute.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PREMIUM

        public static final java.lang.String PREMIUM
        The Premium Edition Database is for situations requiring a high number of transactionsper second (>100). Supports more users than Basic and Standard.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
